r.d: Yar(Yet another RPC framework) is a light, concurrent RPC framework, supports multi package protocols (json, msgpack)
r.n: - USE ZSTR_CHAR to avoding memory allocation - Fixed segfault if tcp server return malformed response->err - Fixed bug tcp client hangs if server closed connection prematurely - Fixed segfault on windows as localtime may return NULL - Fixed all TCP tests on windows
